scripts.start:electron: npm run build:electron && ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:3000 && electron build/electron/app.js
scripts.build:electron: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && cp electron/preload.js build/electron && cp electron/getSasPath.html build/electron
scripts.build:server:api: cd server/api && npm run prebuild && npm ci && npm run build && npm run postbuild
scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build:electron && cd build && mkdir server && npm run build:server:api && cp -r ../server/api/build/. server && cp -r ../server/api/node_modules server && mv server/node_modules server/node_modules_tmp && mkdir react-seed-app && cp -r ../react-seed-app/build react-seed-app
scripts.prepare: git rev-parse --git-dir && git config core.hooksPath ./.git-hooks || true
